text: Tveit may refer to: ==People== *Aaron Tveit (born 1983), an American actor and singer *Alf Kåre Tveit (born 1967), a former footballer who played from 1988 to 1993 for Viking FK *Astrid Tveit (born 1957), a retired Norwegian high jumper *Christian Tveit (born 1992), a Norwegian football striker from Farsund *Espen Tveit (born 1991), a Norwegian speed skater *Ivar Tveit (1880-1952), a Norwegian newspaper editor *John S. Tveit (born 1931), a Norwegian politician for the Christian Democratic Party *Odd Karsten Tveit (born 1945), a Norwegian journalist, writer, and economist *Olav Fykse Tveit (born 1960), a Norwegian Lutheran theologian *Nils Tveit (1876-1949), a Norwegian politician for the Liberal Party ==Places== *Tveit, a village and district in the city of Kristiansand in Vest-Agder county, Norway *Tveit (municipality), a former municipality in Vest-Agder county, Norway *Tveit, Aust-Agder, a village in Åmli municipality in Aust-Agder county, Norway *Tveit, Bygland, a village in Bygland municipality in Aust-Agder county, Norway ==Churches== *Tveit Church (Agder), Norway, a parish church *Tveit Church (Vestland), Norway, a parish church ==See also== *Tveite (disambiguation)
title: Tveit (disambiguation)
